channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 9:28 p.m. ATTENTION !!! Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs).
item.description: 🟠 9:28 p.m. ATTENTION !!! Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs). #Pologivskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
